page.title: 10Farms in Little Ayton.
page.content: In Little Ayton there are three diffrent farms.{Grange Farm}is owned by Petchs. It used to be a dairy farm,but changed to pigs. It doesn't smell that much but when you go up to the gate to the pigs there is usually a lot of noise.At{Brookside farm}the people keep alot of Tractors and Trailers and other equipment. Last of all is Mr Fletchers Farm{Woodhouse. This farm used to be mixed but is now a dairy farm. The fields are all quite big apart from the odd small paddock. There are also four or five stables at the dairy farm that have been there for a long time. During the month of June 1985 the{North York Moors {National Park Committee}aproved a scheme to develop a lake covering four acres at Woodhouse farm Little Ayton for Mr Fletcher.
